fields.label: App launch URL
fields.helptext: The full URL where this application can be accessed.

fields.label: Title
fields.helptext: A title that will be displayed to the user

fields.label: Description
fields.helptext: A description that will be displayed to the user

fields.label: Public Key
fields.helptext: An optional public key with with which to encrypt the launch data

fields.label: Max Session Length (s)
fields.helptext: The maximum number of seconds the session can last. 0 means indefinite.

fields.label: Launch Timeout (s)
fields.helptext: The maximum number of seconds that can pass before the session begins. 0 means indefinite.

fields.label: Custom Launch Data
fields.helptext: Additional data that you can pass to the content.

fields.label: Media Type
fields.helptext: Inform the launch server that this app is a player for given media type.

fields.label: Launch Type
fields.helptext: How will the app URL be displayed to the user?
